subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tony Finau, a long hitter off the tee who won the 2006 Utah State Amateur title, is one of countless golfers opting to start a career at a young age instead of competing in college.
snippet: Tony Finau, a long hitter off the tee who won the 2006 Utah State Amateur title, is one of countless golfers opting to start a career at a young age instead of competing in college.
